channel.title: Need help - Will Rep++
channel.description:
I have a big problem and have been trying to sort it out for ages but haven't had any success. I am using this source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html
My problem: The shops don't work. When I try to buy something it just freezes for 3 seconds. I have tried lots of thing but none of them have worked. I think its something to do with ShopHandler.java but I don't know. Its a codeusa source. Does anyone know where I can get a codeusa source so I can compare them? But I would prefer to keep this source so can anyone help me with this? I will rep++.
Also does anyone know if I can get this somewhere else cos the source link is broken and it looks like quite a good source. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,448966.0.html

item.title: Need help - Will Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Jazzelhawk Jazzelhawk
item.description:
@Jazzelhawk wrote:

I have a big problem and have been trying to sort it out for ages but haven’t had any success. I am using this source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html

My problem: The shops don’t work. When I try to buy something it just freezes for 3 seconds. I have tried lots of thing but none of them have worked. I think its something to do with ShopHandler.java but I don’t know. Its a codeusa source. Does anyone know where I can get a codeusa source so I can compare them? But I would prefer to keep this source so can anyone help me with this? I will rep++.

Also does anyone know if I can get this somewhere else cos the source link is broken and it looks like quite a good source.
